video_prompt: Character subtly smirks, head tilting. Hair strands move. Chain in background sways, then wraps around her, intertwining with her legs and bass guitar. Bass guitar subtly vibrates as if played. Background shifts from magenta to darker tones.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Full shot, edgy punk-rock female character, fair skin, bright blonde high bun with side bangs, striking purple eyes, inviting expression with subtle smirk, slight head tilt. Black choker with silver detail, black treble clef earring. Dark blue sports bra revealing toned midriff, studded black armbands, metallic fuchsia gloves (right with black/white emblem). Distressed blue jeans (ripped knees/thighs), black belt with white metallic rings, thick dark chain from right hip. Dark boots, black bass guitar with fuchsia pink designs angled across body. Vibrant magenta background with heavy, dark chains wrapping around character and guitar. Crisp lighting, metallic sheen.
refined_video_prompt: Character's head subtly tilts as a smirk spreads across her face. Loose hair strands gently sway. A background chain sways, then dynamically wraps around her, intertwining with her legs and bass guitar. Her bass guitar subtly vibrates, as if being played. The background fluidly shifts from vibrant magenta to somber, darker tones.
